units.name: Settler
abilities: Found City: Can found a new city.

units.name: Builder
abilities: Build Improvements: Can build improvements on tiles.
Repair: Can repair damaged buildings and districts.

units.name: Trader
abilities: Establish Trade Route: Can establish trade routes between cities.
Trade Bonuses: Provides bonuses to trade routes.

units.name: Scout
abilities: Reconnaissance: Increased visibility range.
Exploration: Can move through difficult terrain more easily.

units.name: Work Boat
abilities: Fishing: Can improve sea resources.
Resource Harvesting: Can harvest bonus resources from sea tiles.

units.name: Spy
abilities: Infiltration: Can infiltrate enemy cities.
Espionage: Can perform various espionage missions.
Counter-Espionage: Can detect enemy spies.

units.name: Spearman
abilities: Anti-Cavalry: +10 [Combat Strength] against [Cavalry] units.

units.name: Horseman
abilities: Fast Movement: Increased movement speed.

units.name: Catapult
abilities: Siege Attack: Increases [Damage] against [City Walls].

units.name: Light Chariot
abilities: Mobility: Increased movement on flat terrain.

units.name: Heavy Chariot
abilities: Armored: Increased combat strength against ranged attacks.

units.name: Trireme
abilities: Naval Ranged: Can attack at range.

units.name: Caravan
abilities: Establish Land Trade Route: Can establish trade routes between cities over land.
Increased Trade Value: Provides a bonus to the [Gold] yield of trade routes.

units.name: Man-at-Arms
abilities: Disciplined: +5 [Combat Strength] <when defending.>

units.name: Crossbowman
abilities: Accuracy: +5 [Combat Strength] <when attacking cities.>

units.name: Composite Archer
abilities: Increased Range: +3 [Range]

units.name: Knight
abilities: Shock: Has a chance to inflict additional [Damage] on enemy units.

units.name: Trebuchet
abilities: City Breaker: +10 [Combat Strength] <when attacking [City Walls].>

units.name: Quadrireme
abilities: Boarding: Has a chance to capture enemy ships.

units.name: Musketman
abilities: Gunfire: Ignores defensive bonuses from terrain.

units.name: Pikeman
abilities: Anti-Cavalry Wall: +15 combat strength against cavalry units.

units.name: Bombard
abilities: Siege Weapon: +12 [Combat Strength] against [City Walls].

units.name: Cannon
abilities: Siege Barrage: +15 combat strength against city walls.

units.name: Caravel
abilities: Exploration: Increased visibility range and movement on ocean tiles.

units.name: Arquebusier
abilities: Early Firearms: Increases [Damage] against [Melee] units.

units.name: Galleon
abilities: Heavy Broadside: Increased combat strength against naval units.

units.name: Lancer
abilities: Charge: Increased combat strength when attacking open terrain.

units.name: Merchant
abilities: Trade Mission: Can establish [Trade Routes] with increased [Gold] yields.
Purchase Resources: Can purchase [Strategic] resources in cities.

units.name: Explorer
abilities: Expedition: Increased [Visibility] and [Movement] in unexplored territories.
Find Natural Wonders: Increased chance to discover natural wonders.

units.name: Line Infantry
abilities: Bayonet Charge: +10 [Combat Strength] <when attacking.>

units.name: Rifleman
abilities: Long Range: Increases [Range] and [Accuracy].

units.name: Dragoon
abilities: Mounted Assault: Can attack after moving.
Pistol Attack: Can make a [Ranged] attack.

units.name: Cuirassier
abilities: Heavy Armor: Increased [Defense] against [Ranged] attacks.

units.name: Field Cannon
abilities: Explosive Rounds: Increased [Damage] against [Fortifications].

units.name: Ironclad
abilities: Iron Hull: Increased [Defense] against attacks.

units.name: Privateer
abilities: Raider: Increased [Movement] and [Combat Strength] <when raiding [Trade Routes].>

units.name: Engineer
abilities: Rapid Construction: Speeds up the construction of improvements and infrastructure.
Infrastructure Specialist: Provides a bonus to the production of railroads and factories.

units.name: Journalist
abilities: Cultural Influence: Increases [Cultural Influence] over [Puppeted], [Conquered] or [Neighbouring] cities.
Propaganda: Can spread [Cultural Influnce] to weaken enemy cities.

units.name: Infantry
abilities: Modern Warfare: Increased [Combat Strength] in all [Open] terrains.

units.name: Machine Gun
abilities: Suppressive Fire: Increased [Combat Strength] <when defending.>

units.name: Tank
abilities: Blitzkrieg: Increased [Combat Strength] <when attacking.>

units.name: Biplane
abilities: Air Combat: Effective against other air units and ground units.
Reconnaissance: Increased visibility range.

units.name: Fighter
abilities: Air Superiority: +10 [Combat Strength] against enemy's [Aircraft] units.

units.name: Bomber
abilities: Strategic Bombing: Increased [Damage] against [Cities] and [Fortifications].

units.name: Destroyer
abilities: Anti-Submarine Warfare: Increased [Combat Strength] against [Militant Deep Naval] units.

units.name: Submarine
abilities: Stealth: Invisible to most units unless the enemy has discovered [Radar].

units.name: Diplomat
abilities: Diplomatic Negotiation: Enhances diplomatic relations and can negotiate treaties.
Intelligence Gathering: Gathers information about other civilizations.

units.name: Mechanized Infantry
abilities: Rapid Deployment: Increased [Movement] and [Combat Strength] in [Open] terrains.

units.name: Rocket Artillery
abilities: Long-Range Barrage: Increased [Range] and [Damage] against [Fortifications].

units.name: Modern Armor
abilities: Armor Plating: Increased [Defense] against [Ranged] attacks.
Rapid Fire: Can attack twice.

units.name: Jet Fighter
abilities: Air Superiority: +10 [Combat Strength] against enemy's [Aircraft] units.
Interceptor: Can intercept enemy air units.

units.name: Stealth Bomber
abilities: Stealth Bombing: Increased [Damage] against [Cities] and [Fortifications], hard to be detected.

units.name: Nuclear Submarine
abilities: Nuclear Strike: Can launch nuclear missiles.
Stealth: Invisible to most units unless the enemy has discovered [Advanced Naval Tactics].

units.name: Missile Destroyer
abilities: Guided Missiles: Increased [Damage] against [Militant Naval] and [Land] units.
Anti-Air Defense: Strong [Defense] against [Air] attacks.

units.name: Propagandist
abilities: Mass Propaganda: Increases [Cultural Influence] over [Neighbouring] cities.
Moral Breaker: Lowers the [Happiness] of enemy [Cities].

units.name: Modern Infantry
abilities: Advanced Tactics: Increased [Combat Strength] and [Defense] in all terrains.

units.name: Modern Tank
abilities: Advanced Armor: High [Defense] against all attacks.
Precision Strike: Increased [Accuracy] and [Damage] against all units.

units.name: Modern Jet Fighter
abilities: Advanced Air Superiority: Increased by 150% [Combat Strength] against enemy [Aircraft] units, and interception capabilities.

units.name: Modern Stealth Bomber
abilities: Advanced Stealth Bombing: Devastating [Damage] against [Cities] and [Fortifications], nearly undetectable.

units.name: Modern Destroyer
abilities: Advanced Missile Systems: High [Damage] against all [Water] and [Land] units, and strong anti-air [Defense].

units.name: Modern Submarine
abilities: Advanced Stealth: Near-undetectable, and nuclear missile capabilities.

units.name: Modern Helicopter
abilities: Rapid Deployment: Can move over all terrain, and attack after moving.

units.name: Cyber Warfare Specialist
abilities: Cyber Attack: Performs [Cyber] attacks to disrupt enemy infrastructure.
Cyber Defense: Defends against [Cyber] attacks.
Infrastructure Disruption: Can disrupt enemy technological advancements.

units.name: Modern Diplomat
abilities: Advanced Treaty: Ability to negotiate very complex international treaties.
Advanced Trading: Ability to conduct very complex, and rewarding trade deals.

units.name: Giant Death Robot
abilities: Devastating Assault: High [Combat Strength] and bonus [Damage] against all units and cities.

units.name: Exo-Suit Soldier
abilities: Enhanced Strength: High [Combat Strength] and [Defense].
Powered Exoskeleton: Increased [Movement] and ability to traverse difficult terrain.

units.name: Hover Tank
abilities: Hover Technology: Increased [Movement] and ignores terrain costs.
Advanced Weaponry: High [Damage] against all units.

units.name: Space Fighter
abilities: Space Superiority: High [Combat Strength] against [Aircraft] and [Spacecraft] units.
Orbital Interception: Can intercept enemy units in space.

units.name: Orbital Satellite
abilities: Orbital Bombardment: Extremely high [Damage] against [Cities] and [Fortifications].
Global Surveillance: Provides vision across the entire map.

units.name: Space Carrier
abilities: Mobile Base: Can launch and support [Spacecraft] units.
Advanced Defense Systems: High [Defense] against all attacks.

units.name: Samurai
abilities: Bushido: +5 [Combat Strength] against [Injured] units.
Loyalty: +10 [Combat Strength] <when in [Japan]'s territory>.

units.name: Zero Fighter
abilities: Agile: +1 [Movement]
Air Superiority: +10 [Combat Strength] against enemy's [Aircraft] units.

units.name: Teppo Ashigaru
abilities: Volley Fire: +5 [Combat Strength] <when attacking with 2 adjacent [Teppo Ashigaru] or more.>

units.name: Yumi Archer
abilities: Long Range: +1 [Range] <when attacking from [Hills] or [Forest] tiles.>

units.name: Mortar Ashigaru
abilities: Bombardment: +10 [Combat Strength] against [City Walls].

great_units.name: Great General
abilities: Military Tactics: Provides a combat bonus to nearby [Militant] units.
Instant Army: Can instantly create a [Militant] unit.

great_units.name: Great Admiral
abilities: Naval Tactics: Provides a combat bonus to nearby [Militant Naval] units.
Instant Fleet: Can instantly create a [Militant Naval] unit.

great_units.name: Great Scientist
abilities: Eureka Momentum: Provides a boost to a random technology.
Scientific Breakthrough: Instantly completes a technology.

great_units.name: Great Writer
abilities: Literary Work: Creates a [Great Work of Writing], providing [Culture].
Political Treatise: Provides culture and diplomatic bonuses.

great_units.name: Great Artist
abilities: Artistic Masterpiece: Creates a [Great Work of Art], providing [Culture].
Cultural Influence: Increases [Cultural Influence] over [Puppeted], [Conquered] or [Neighbouring] cities.

great_units.name: Great Merchant
abilities: Trade Mission: Establishes a trade route with increased [Gold] yields.
Economic Boost: Provides a large amount of [Gold].

great_units.name: Great Engineer
abilities: Engineering Marvel: Instantly completes a wonder or building.
Infrastructure Boost: Provides a production bonus to a city.

Religious Combat: Stronger when fighting units of other religions.
